document_data.name: Andamaar's Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Andamaar's Street''' was a lesser avenue, paved in corduroy-logs, situated between the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] and [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].<ref>
document_data.Geography:
Andamaar's Street marked the southern border of North Ward<ref> and the northern border of Trades Ward.<ref> It traveled from northwest to southeast, extending off of [[Zendulth Street]] and terminating at the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]].

On the Trades Ward side, Andamaar's Street was met from the south by [[Lamp Street]] and [[Theln Lane]], On the North Ward side of the street, Andamaar's acted as the western terminus of [[Undal's Lane]].
document_data.History: When Waterdeep's walls expanded in [[1101 DR]] to accommodate more settlers, the new perimeter approximated what would come to be the overall shape of Andamaar's Street.<ref>
